Generation IV.Diamond: It wraps things with its extensible tongue. Getting too close to it will leave you soaked with drool.
Generation IV.Pearl: It wraps things with its extensible tongue. Getting too close to it will leave you soaked with drool.
Generation IV.Platinum: The long tongue is always soggy with slobber. The saliva contains a solvent that causes numbness.
Generation IV.HeartGold: Its saliva can decompose anything. It wraps its long tongue around things to coat them with its sticky saliva.
Generation IV.SoulSilver: It has space in its throat to store saliva. It can also roll up its tongue and store it in the same spot.

Generation V.Black: The long tongue is always soggy with slobber. The saliva contains a solvent that causes numbness.
Generation V.White: The long tongue is always soggy with slobber. The saliva contains a solvent that causes numbness.
Generation V.Black 2: Their saliva contains lots of components that can dissolve anything. The numbness caused by their lick does not dissipate.
Generation V.White 2: Their saliva contains lots of components that can dissolve anything. The numbness caused by their lick does not dissipate.

Generation VI.X: It wraps things with its extensible tongue. Getting too close to it will leave you soaked with drool.
Generation VI.Y: Their saliva contains lots of components that can dissolve anything. The numbness caused by their lick does not dissipate.
Generation VI.Omega Ruby: It wraps things with its extensible tongue. Getting too close to it will leave you soaked with drool.
Generation VI.Alpha Sapphire: Their saliva contains lots of components that can dissolve anything. The numbness caused by their lick does not dissipate.

Generation VII.Ultra Sun: A contest is under way to determine which one can stick its tongue out the farthest. The current record is...more than 82 feet .
Generation VII.Ultra Moon: It uses its tongue much more skillfully than its hands or its feet. It can deftly pick up a single small bean with its tongue.

Generation VIII.Sword: Lickilicky's strange tongue can stretch to many times the length of its body. No one has figured out how Lickilicky's tongue can stretch so far.
Generation VIII.Shield: Lickilicky can do just about anything with its tongue, which is as dexterous as the human hand. In contrast, Lickilicky's use of its fingers is clumsy.
Generation VIII.Brilliant Diamond: It wraps things with its extensible tongue. Getting too close to it will leave you soaked with drool.
Generation VIII.Shining Pearl: It wraps things with its extensible tongue. Getting too close to it will leave you soaked with drool.
Generation VIII.Legends: Arceus: Its tongue can extend and contract freely, and it is capable of reaching lengths over 10 times Lickilicky's height. Beware of the saliva, as it contains corrosive elements.
